title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.76 - Critical care units (type i)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.76 - Critical care units (type i)

State Regulations
(a) Intensive medical care. (b) Medical
director who has completed residency training in one of the major clinical
specialties and has acquired advanced skills and knowledge in life support and
patient monitoring techniques. (c) The medical director devotes the majority of his time to the unit. (d) An MD (attending or senior resident)
physically present within the unit 24 hours a day. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.76

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
